mapper.update: UPDATE H_QUESTION SET ctitle = #{ctitle}, ccontent = #{ccontent}, cregdate = sysdate WHERE cno = #{cno} and mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, Q.* FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT Q.*, NVL2(A.ANO,'답변','미답변') ANSWERED FROM H_QUESTION Q LEFT OUTER JOIN H_ANSWER A ON Q.cno = A.cno) Q ORDER BY q.CREGDATE DESC, Q.CNO DESC) Q WHERE ROWNUM <= #{perPageNum}) Q WHERE Q.RNUM >= #{pageStart}
